title: Is the Apple iPhone 12 series with 5G support to cost lower than expected? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many roumors claimed that iphone 12 5g model start at just 649$ for base varient as compared to same price as iphone 11 and pro models start at respectively 999$ and 1099$ as compared same to 11 pro/pro max but you have new 5g support na.
